member.name: M:ScholarsLib.Home.StartupTimer_Tick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This sub's only function is to load the login screen. This was done because the program threw an exception everytime I tried to do this from within the page load if the user chose to exit.

member.name: P:ScholarsLib.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ScholarsLib.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:ScholarsLib.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
